p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
1/2/71
The date is in error. The letter enclosed a copy of a report, J. Rudall to M, dated 31 January 1872 (in this edition as 72-01-31a).

The enclosed, dear Sir Henry, is a copy of the notes on the bone-remnants supposed to be those of some of Leichhardts party, and found by Mr Gilmour at Wantatta.
Wanta t a waterhole, Qld. See Gilmour's report, Brisbane courier , 13 December, 1871, p. 3, col. b.
The examination was made by my friend Dr James Rudall, one of our leading operative Surgeons and anatomists.
